detailed_design.description: Design and implement UI for displaying current user context (active window, current activity, mode). Shows real-time context that drives the context awareness engine. Supports capability.context_awareness from roadmap.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Design context display component. 2. Add active window indicator. 3. Add current activity display. 4. Add mode indicator (Deep Work, Relax, etc.). 5. Connect to context awareness backend.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see what context the agent is aware of.
As a user, I want to know which mode I'm currently in.
As a user, I want to quickly switch modes.

technical_notes.current_issue: No UI for context awareness display
